Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following  earlier signal problems at Linden. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following  earlier signal problems at Linden

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th,  #115 Pullman/115th Temporary  Westbound Reroute near 95th/St Lawrence
ShortDescription: WB 95 95th, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th St Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #95 95th, #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th including the normal route streets at the beginning and end due to street blockage near 95th/St. Lawrence.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near 95th/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th/St. Lawrence.
